subject: Horses
Horsemanship and Equestrian Events
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Armed with harsher penalties and more investigative muscle, sport officials and drug stewards are keeping a close eye on the horses competing at the World Equestrian Games.
snippet: Armed with harsher penalties and more investigative muscle, sport officials and drug stewards are keeping a close eye on the horses competing at the World Equestrian Games.
